resources.string: JHashPassword creates secure different passwords for each host (websites, banking, ...) using one passphrase!
Please add your PayPal-name to assign your donation!
Do you want to clear the clipboard?
The entered serial-number is not valid. Please ensure that the entered serial-number is correct and contact me, if the one I send you is not working!
The entered serial-number is valid. Restarting JHashPassword...
The entered serial-number is not valid. Please check the entered serial-number and contact me, if the one I send you is not working.
Wifi is not enabled. Please enable wifi for using the synchronization.
Do you accept the incoming connection request from
Sorry, but this feature is only available in the pro version of JHashPassword.
Password created and stored in clipboard! The password will be removed from clipboard after 3 minutes.

Attention! You are going to delete the HashPassword.xml.
It is possible, that you are no longer able to recover your passwords! 

Are you really sure that you want to delete it?
There is no sdcard mounted or there is no write permission. Due to this situation, you can\'t make an import or backup.
Could not write on sdcard. Please check your permissions.
Backup was successfull. The XML-file was exported into the folder \'JHashPassword\' on your sdcard.

Attention! You are going to overwrite the existing HashPassword.xml with the one you chose.
It is possible, that you are no longer able to recover your passwords! 

Are you really sure that you want to overwrite it?

Attention!

If you save the changes, it is possible, that you are no longer able to recover your passwords! You can recover the passwords, if you have a backup of the HashPassword.xml or you if remember the original values! 

Are you really sure that you want to save the changes?

Welcome!
This is the first start.

If you need help, press the menu-key and click 'help'.
If you want to import an existing XML-file go to the settings-menu by clicking the menu-key.
Error while reading XML-file. The file maybe has been corrupted. Validate it\'s content or replace it by a backup.\n\nDo you want to do an import? JHashpassword will exit otherwise.
